import React from 'react'; import logoShop from "../assets/img/shop-logo.jpeg" import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import Search from "./Search"; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {selectCartProducts, selectCartTotalPrice} from "../redux/slices/cartSlice"; const Header = () => { const totalCartCount = useSelector(selectCartProducts) const totalCartPrice = useSelector(selectCartTotalPrice) return (

Shopping-List

the most useful grocery

{totalCartPrice} €
{totalCartCount}
); }; export default Header;
